q: They're already debating about what it will mean. I'm no business expert, but I do a few things and I don't see much change happening here. After all, as Eric Schmidt wrote, As Executive Chairman, I will focus wherever I can add the greatest value: externally, on the deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership that are increasingly important given Google's global reach.
